Donya Behroozi is a student at California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo, pursuing a Bachelor of Science in statistics. She currently is working with Dr. Billie-Jo Grant in undergraduate research to investigate sexual misconduct cases between teachers and students in K-12 schools across the United States. In her free time, Donya likes to go on hikes, runs, and read spooky thriller books.
